name: Nightfight
overview: A Scorched Earth\Tanks clone by Michael Peppel. In it the game is about action short and to the point. Many, many years ago in a galaxy far, far away. Your father, commander of the armed forces of Stern UZB 3784653B and father of four sons, wrote a computer directive shortly before his death on which all four sons had to compete. The best of them should inherit and go down in stellar history as The Nightfighter. Beat your brothers and you shall inherit the title.
